courses.name: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: An introductory course to computer science, focusing on programming and computational thinking.

courses.name: Calculus I
courses.description: An introductory course in calculus, covering limits, derivatives, and integrals.

courses.name: General Chemistry
courses.description: An introductory course in general chemistry, focusing on chemical reactions and lab work.

courses.name: Introduction to Psychology
courses.description: Introduction to the study of human behavior and mental processes.

courses.name: World History
courses.description: A broad overview of world history, from ancient civilizations to the modern era.

courses.name: Principles of Economics
courses.description: Basic principles of microeconomics and macroeconomics.

courses.name: Introduction to Sociology
courses.description: An overview of societal structures and human interaction.

courses.name: English Composition
courses.description: Focuses on improving writing skills, with an emphasis on essays and compositions.

courses.name: Introduction to Philosophy
courses.description: An exploration of fundamental philosophical questions and theories.

courses.name: Biology I
courses.description: An introduction to biological principles, including cell biology and genetics.

courses.name: Introduction to Art
courses.description: An introductory course exploring various forms of art and their historical significance.

courses.name: Introduction to Music
courses.description: A survey of music history and theory, focusing on different genres and periods.

courses.name: Introduction to Political Science
courses.description: A foundational course in political systems, ideologies, and government structures.

courses.name: Introduction to Anthropology
courses.description: An exploration of human societies, cultures, and their development.

courses.name: Introduction to Astronomy
courses.description: A beginner's guide to the study of celestial objects and the universe.

courses.name: Introduction to Environmental Science
courses.description: Covers key topics in environmental science, including ecosystems, pollution, and conservation.

courses.name: Introduction to Business
courses.description: An overview of business principles and practices, including management and entrepreneurship.

courses.name: Introduction to Marketing
courses.description: An introduction to marketing strategies, consumer behavior, and market research.

courses.name: Introduction to Finance
courses.description: Covers basic finance principles, including investment, budgeting, and financial analysis.

courses.name: Introduction to Engineering
courses.description: Provides a broad overview of the engineering field, with an introduction to key concepts and disciplines.
